title: Find Mol
content:
earch for Mol on the path to Baldur's Gate. Search for Mol in Baldur's Gate. Find Mol's contract in House of Hope.

Find Mol Walkthrough

Tiefling kids in Last Light Inn (After ambush) You can't find Mol in Moonrise Towers, instead, when you reach Baldur's Gate, you can find the kid in Guildhall. (X-13, Y751) The Entrance to the Guildhall is at Lower City. (X61, Y-99) Mol's contract with Raphael can be found in House of Hope. There's an Inert Infernal Gem on a wall. Pass the DC10 Wisdom and DC20
